/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny and warm day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
